website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy backdrop stand kit designed for heavier, larger backdrops.
pros: Heavy-duty crossbars can handle greater weights for thicker backdrops
Tripod stands are stable on hard and soft surfaces
cons: Center crossbars do not lock into each other, allowing the metal to rotate around in place

customer_reviews.title: Holds decently heavy projector screen
customer_reviews.text: We bought this stand to hold a projector screen for our backyard. The screen is about 30lbs and it worked perfectly!! We did put some weights on the bottom just to be safe but it was already pretty sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good value on LimoStudio backdrop stand
customer_reviews.text: Works great and very steady with a six foot roll. Haven't tried it yet with a wider roll. Easy to set up and take down. Packs easily into its carry bag. Much more sturdy than the one we already had.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Barnicle

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before you buy it
customer_reviews.text: Three weeks ago, I bought the LimoStudio 10 x 12ft Heavy Duty Backdrop Support System. This is one of the most expensive backdrop support systems that you can find in Amazon, but I wanted to be sure that I wouldn't have any kind of issues in the future, regarding the quality of the product. Despite the high price, the system is too fragile. One of the tripod stands broke before the first use. Besides the lack of quality of the product, the supplier - KimOutlet - refused to find a fair solution to solve my problem. In short, I bought a product for US$64,99+shipping cost and I can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Cravo

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for displaying quilts on at the craft shows I recently started doing. This frame expands out 5 bars on the top (I used 3 for this purpose). One king size quilt and a twin quilt hanging on the other side weighing about 35 lbs and they didn't even sag the top bar! I did weight the wide spread feet of the frame with sand bags for insurance. This has been the most wonderful tool for my quilt shop. I will be buying another one in the near future and this will be the one I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Massey

customer_reviews.title: Already bending right with the first backdrop right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this backdrop would be great addition to our Studio..... but as you can see it is bending right in the middle of the stand.... this is the first time I have used this stand right out of the box. I am very disappointed in the quality of this it came with scratches on it like it was used also. Be warned it is not that great of a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Meythaler

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, instructions need improvement....
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and is a nice unit. The directions are horrendous (reason for one less star). The pictures of the product differed from what I received. My unit did not have the easy "pop in buttons" like the photo on Amazon. They were VERY difficult to figure out and the instructions are very minimal. But the product is nice, sturdy and it will be easy to use, now that I figured out the assembly. The bag is really nice, though the zipper does seem a bit tough to manage Overall, it is going to be perfect for traveling to homes for photography gigs.
customer_reviews.author: prplcws

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I bought this one b/c it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I bought this one b/c it is made for heavy duty and someone's review said it held up their 30 lb projector screen. I'm using it as a backdrop for my graduation party. The top bar dips a little as expected and explained but because our backdrop is a polyester fabric, we chose to go out to buy a 12 ft metal rod, drilled holes on each end, and used that instead to hold up our fabric and wisteria flowers. Looking to get another one for our dessert table. Highly recommend even with the rods that are provide b/c it is versatile and can be used for lightweight or heavier-duty décor.
customer_reviews.author: SH1738

customer_reviews.title: Im super glad I upgraded to buy this heavy duty backdrop ...
customer_reviews.text: Im super glad I upgraded to buy this heavy duty backdrop post. This is some serious equipment. I previously bought a smaller more basic kit which was ok, but I was never 100% confident and happy, more so because the basic kit appeared flimsy and weak. But when I pony up and bought this kit I am so pleased!!!!! Product is great for our application and use. stands are bigger and stronger, and cross pole at full length does seem to sag a bit in the middle, it did not hamper our operations. I give this product 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Reyton S.

customer_reviews.title: Well I liked this backdrop but I had to return it because ...
customer_reviews.text: Well we really liked this backdrop but had to return it because it was bending a little bit in the middle after stretching to full width. It was ordered for an event . We were a bit disappointed at first when we noticed the bending on the top but then we found a solution where we covered it with balloons later (as shown in the pic below). That was the only drawback we saw with the limostudio other than that, it worked out great for us. Before and after pic in the images section.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive High Ratings
customer_reviews.text: I'm always amazed when products get a 4-5 star review on Amazon and they are junk. I bought two of these from different manufacturers however they look like they were made in the same place and re-branded. The box came from Amazon undamaged, when I took the stands from the bag one of the stands had a huge impact dent on it, so this happened during the packaging process - I had no choice except to use this piece of junk stand for an event. Like the other one I bought it is better suited for VERY light duty, it is already falling apart and has issues.
customer_reviews.author: Banshee4u

customer_reviews.title: OK, with one major flaw
customer_reviews.text: The crossbar on this unit is weak and doesn't have locking sections...you insert then twist 90° but the sections never really lock in place. I would recommend to use gaffer tape to hold them together after you attach them...or risk them falling apart if someone accidentally walks into one of the stands. Otherwise, this is a good enough system for a starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Forant

customer_reviews.title: this item stood up and is great. Even fully extended
customer_reviews.text: I hang several backgrounds on this. I had to keep one link from the top in order for it not to sag too much. But after changing a lot of backgrounds over time, this item stood up and is great. Even fully extended, it is quite durable. I recommend losing one link at the top and keeping both ends the same height. For the price, this stand is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M.

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged, not from shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really impressed with the quality of this for the price. The tripods are really sturdy. The unit i received had scratches and the labels were peeling. A zipper doesn’t work on the carrying case etc. the shipping packaging was fine, so I think it was repackaged or returned. :(
customer_reviews.author: Zac k.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stand!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stand! I have the $30 one as well, but I recommend this one better, it supports my heavy backdrops perfectly and it's big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Srod AlmenaraTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty back drop support
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it a large spring came out of one of the vertical poles Then I had an issue with a metal piece that was glued to the vertical pole. This piece is what the thumb screw screws into to hold the height of the vertical pole. Later in the Christmas season, two more of the pieces came loose. The bag holding the equipment ripped and had to be sewn twice where I zip it up. It worked and got me through a Christmas season. I would not buy it again though.
customer_reviews.author: john hayes

customer_reviews.title: sturday and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy and can assemble in minutes. Used it for home shoot of my youngest using some light weight paper background and it works in small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ahang

customer_reviews.title: Light, easy to setup background stand set
customer_reviews.text: A well thought out product to hold background fabric or paper. Light to carry and the cloth bag handle is large enough to hold one or two cloth backgrounds rolled up. It allows 8' high and 8+' wide backgrounds and is easy to set up without help. It is made of relatively light metal, allowing it to be light, but I don't see it surviving the abuse of travel and repeated setup/takedowns. In perspective, it is a super value and that allows you to own two, reducing studio background change time.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Finklestein

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up held up for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: This came in a nice bag and was very easy to set up and use. I hung fabric strips to create a colorful backdrop for the dessert table. I did tie the top bar to my rain gutter because there was a breeze that afternoon and I was worried it would topple over. I had it set up about 8.5ft high and 9ft wide. I dont know how sturdy it would have been much higher than that without additional reinforcements.
customer_reviews.author: LaLaLynn

customer_reviews.title: Great frame
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty frame like the description states. I bought it to use as a frame for a photo booth for a college graduation party. It was easy to put up and it was light enough to take with us easily. I love it and I am very happy that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Versatile for Backdrop or Screen
customer_reviews.text: I host a dance show twice a year and the area we use as a dressing room has large picture windows and no blinds or curtains. Since I'm not allowed to install blinds or curtains I had been covering the windows with paper. This is so much better. I hang black out curtains on it and my dancers feel safe changing in the room. Plus it provides a nice back drop for photos on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: JLJohnson01

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a stronger crossbar to support the huge role of paper ... this worked great. Advise to get sandbags for weighting down the legs for stability ... we filled them with rice :) not sand....
customer_reviews.author: G. Tsabag

customer_reviews.title: Used for projection screen
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use with our projection screen and it works great. It's very easy to collapse so we will keep the screen on it until the end of the warm season. We used zip ties for the screen and bought steaks to keep it from tipping, although they weren't necessary unless it was windy.
customer_reviews.author: Meeko

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is good for the price, but if I had it to do over again I might spend a bit more to get a more substantial cross-bar. The two stands/uprights are fine, but the multi-piece cross bar while easy to assemble is less rigid than I hoped. The sag isn't bad and is still very usable, but even without a backdrop on it there is a noticeable droop. I may just build my own cross-bar.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Guy

customer_reviews.title: Overall the size and construction is great and they are a nice mix between durability and ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these and after several setups (couple dozen each?) parts started falling off of them. There are small metal/plastic pieces that guard the cylinder poles from the wingnuts as you tighten them down. All of these came apart over time and when you tighten the wingnut on the base down it cinches the pole making setup particularly difficult. Overall the size and construction is great and they are a nice mix between durability and compactness but the busted parts make them a poor poor long term investment.
customer_reviews.author: VTguy

customer_reviews.title: Works well, and holds a muslin backdrop
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough for the small photo backdrop i need it for. When i did try to connect all the top pieces together and hung a backdrop on it, it does sag in the middle. I only used 2 of the provided extenders and it did not sag like that. The legs are pretty light and easily moved around, i suggest anchoring it to something heavier to prevent any moving back and fourth in case someone where to pass close by it.
customer_reviews.author: Jatz_Crz

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this stand for 1 1/2 months and have used it 3 times, and 2 pieces that help prevent indention marks on the adjustable legs have already fallen off, therefore already causing small dents in the pole legs. I don’t think I’ll be using it long since I’m afraid that over time it will dent the poles enough to bend inside and fall or cause a whole from adjusting the height. I purchased this stand with the intent of using it as a back drop for birthday party’s since it is considered “heavy duty”, and even though it served its purpose well the first 2 times I would definitely not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Yomie

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but with some challenges.
customer_reviews.text: The backdrop itself feels and looks quite sturdy, but as soon as I took the first stand out the packaging, a spring dropped out and I could not figure out where it came from.The screw which holds the main part of the stand together also got loose, so I have to be careful every time I am mounting the stand. Apart from that, it works very well.The height is great and it handles a sizeable backdrop very well.
customer_reviews.author: cordell mcclure

customer_reviews.title: Saved us $$
customer_reviews.text: Easy assemble , tried first at home before heading to out of town wedding. Was disappointed with slight sag of pipe in middle, but reviews and instructions address (safety feature). Allowed us to create sweetheart table backdrop more affordably, thank hiring backdrop company for $900!! Cost me $275 after decorating. Worth it. Bag zipper broke, but bag has clips that allowed me to connect and carry. I'll email company & see if they'll replace bag.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had decided to buy this item because was a "Heavy Duty" but quality is far away from that. On first use one of the tripod started falling parts away, inside the pipes and falling to the floor. Very disappointed with this product will not recommend it or neither buy it again. Can't claim anything after the 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A Nuñez

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for our wedding backdrop
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our wedding backdrop. Very easy to setup and take down. The carrying case that came with it worked well to hold everything.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: While the stand is great, the accompanying carrying bag is horrible
customer_reviews.text: While the stand is great, the accompanying carrying bag is horrible, which is a deal breaker if you care a lot about mobility. The zippers are very fragile and break easily. Mine broke while i was showing up to a shoot, and all the poles spilled out, such a huge pain, i had to ask the model to help me carry them lol. I have no motivation to bring this item anywhere anymore due to the lack of a carrying bag, which sucks cause i have a corporate shoot coming up =(
customer_reviews.author: George J. Charlemagne

customer_reviews.title: So glad I spent the extra money for this heavy duty ...
customer_reviews.text: So glad I spent the extra money for this heavy duty frame rather than a cheaper and lighter one. It is a bit heavy, but it is very easy to set up, alone or with a helper. It had held up very well so far, even at events where I am photographing rambunctious dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Rezis

customer_reviews.title: Happy Shopper
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for an at home holiday party. It was very sturdy and easy to assemble. I put a 12x9 muslim cloth on it and it held great. I recently used it for a second time at a birthday party. My only dislike is that it does not fit perfectly in the carrying case. You have to push down on the spring loaded poles in order to zip the top cover. This may be user error. I have not tried too hard because I was in a hurry to pack up. I felt that the price and product quality were a good match.
customer_reviews.author: MrsJBW

customer_reviews.title: light, cheap and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, easy to put together and take apart once you get the hang of it. It has so far survived more than a dozen setups and teardowns. Don't tighten the stands too much or the screw will sink into the cheap aluminum and leave pock-marks on the poles. The transport bag is absolute garbage. Mine had a hole in the zipper fabric upon delivery and the first time I attempted to zip up the bag after teardown, the zip pull itself came off, so now the bag won't zip at all.
customer_reviews.author: hypethetica bold

customer_reviews.title: Okay for Light Weight Backdrops
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I purchased. The first one was even cheaper and basically worthless. This is a step above that but if you’re going to be hanging any drops at the full extension of the stand, this one is a little weak in the middle as well. I’d save up and buy a more sturdy one if I were you.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Peck

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hang quilts for photographing. Removed one crossbar and still had adequate spece for my largest quilt with no sagging (110"x120"). It did take an extra long time to arrive, even with my Prime account. The storage bag is a plus! Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy S

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my wedding photo booth. Amazing!!! Easy to carry, easy to set, easy to take down, easy to get back home!! 1, 2, 3 and boom!! It hold my backdrop, swag, lights, flowers, everything with no problem, sturdy . Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Wilmarie

customer_reviews.title: This is great product, We bought it for babyshower party
customer_reviews.text: This is great product, We bought it for babyshower party, Buy this item form amazon, get the King Bedsheet from Costco or Sams Club, Open stitches on the side of the besdsheets and use it as drape on this backdrop. Awesome Product and its really great cheap idea instead of paying it to rent it from rental companies.
customer_reviews.author: harry

customer_reviews.title: Great for conventions and art shows
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stand, I use it for conventions and trade shows to display my artwork. I bought this for the 10’ height, and I was pretty impressed. It’s just high enough to display my 11x17 art prints without being too high to miss the top row of artwork. It’s easy to setup, and I could even do it on my own if needed. The stand was a little longer than I thought when taken apart and inside the bag, which might be troublesome if I ever needed to fly with it. But for regular travel, it’s perfect. I would definitely recommended this stand to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: kitty42

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy background stand
customer_reviews.text: This stand is very sturdy and comes with a good carrying bag. I tried it with a new background paper roll and it didn't sag at all.I used only two rods as the paper was 53'. There is a mild sag when we use the 4 rods but don't think it's that much noticeable and the seller left a note saying it helps in stability of the structure. Overall am satisfied with this purchase and would recommend this for someone looking for a sturdy background stand.
customer_reviews.author: Anca

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money, not completely heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: The spring loaded stands are pretty great, but the crossbar leaves a little to be desired. You have to leave one section out to avoid bowing in the middle because those pieces aren't what I would call heavy duty, and I'm only holding muslin up there. Overall, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Hegel

customer_reviews.title: Not made for constant use.. pieces will slowly come off.
customer_reviews.text: It broke after may 6 sessions of using it! I was very pleased with these stands in the beginning. Holding they would last a year or even two because of the way they’re made. Boy was I wrong. These will not last you more than three months. The metal plates for the spring came off. Now I’m foced to purchase a more durable and heavier stand. These won’t cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyara Lombre

customer_reviews.title: Just......the WORST.
customer_reviews.text: Zipper ripped off on the FIRST pull unboxing. I have bought cheap backdrops in the past for quick black out setups.... but this set is TRASH. Literally, junk. Do NOT waste your money or time.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and holds my backdrops without any problems. The bag will hold it all nicely too. I like the spring support and weight of it. My clips work perfectly. And I like that I can go taller or less wide.
customer_reviews.author: terri tiffany

customer_reviews.title: surpasses expectations
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, very portable. pretty dang sturdy in my opinion. someone else said that it was cheap and flimsy. i guess im not sure what high quality one they are used to working with but i think this is pretty nice. it works great for what i need it for and still surpasses my expectations, after all, it did fit all those guys in front of it and stood up to all that trampling
customer_reviews.author: Eric ETop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really a lot more durable than I expected for the price. I’ve been a professional photographer for 20 years and have purchased a lot of backdrop stands. I typically buy the expensive name brand stands but needed a new one one quickly so I ordered this expecting to have to purchase a better one later. I definitely won’t have to purchase another one. This one is great!
customer_reviews.author: Innamorata

customer_reviews.title: but I'm highly disappointed that Amazon would send this to me (I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this purchase, but I'm highly disappointed that Amazon would send this to me (I purchased this directly from Amazon). It arrived in a box full of grocery bags as "packing", the item itself was dirty, all of the poles scratched and the middle connector beam bent making the product literally usable.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this backdrop display. It is so much easier to hang displays for my dessert tables. The travel case makes it easy to transport and store. The poles are easy to assemble. Adding more height and width is easy too. Could assemble in less than 5 minutes by myself. Such good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mayon Sespene

customer_reviews.title: solidly built backdrop
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built backdrop. Make sure you extend the tripod base to the widest possible stance for stability. The top bar has arrows to help line up the sections of the top pole for maximum stability. The carrying case for the backdrop is well designed. The clips work well although it would be nice to have them designed to work around the diameter of the side support poles.
customer_reviews.author: bookreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we need to use this for. Read all dimensions so you know what you are getting. Assembly is super easy, cannot see why this would not last a while.
customer_reviews.author: RAJR@74

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use. After reading some user's reviews I questioned whether to buy this, but if you use common sense and realize this is not professional grade equipment and should only be used for light-weight backdrops then you shouldn't have any issues. Even the directions say that some bowing across the top is normal if you use all the bars included in the kit. This serves my purpose perfectly and I'm glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Catharine B Metzinger

customer_reviews.title: Performs as promised
customer_reviews.text: I have been impressed with the quality and sturdiness of this product. It is light enough for my 21 year old sister to carry, assemble, and disassemble without assistance. While light and easy to assemble, it supports heavy duty backdrops without becoming flimsy. She has taken it to photoshoots throughout the county and it has performed as promised.
customer_reviews.author: AustinJCollins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, but it is flimsy material. This is ok for a small space or a space where you can set it up and leave it for extended periods, but if you have to set it up and tear it down a lot, it WILL bend and break. Understand its limitations and it will work great for you.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bopp

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Difficulty Packing Away
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to assemble and decent quality. My only dislike is the carrying case. It's hard to zip up the bag because the stands have to be placed in the bag just right, like a jigsaw puzzle. Also, I have to be careful, because the zipper has a section that breaks apart, so if the stands aren't sandwiched together just right, the zipper will cease to work. Packing away would be so much quicker if the bag was made better.
customer_reviews.author: SCBS_1005

customer_reviews.title: really just hoped for the best with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews...really just hoped for the best with this purchase. I am so pleased that I bought it. I have already set up and taken down twice for shoots. So easy to handle. Everything fits in the bag provided. I just go slowly and handle the plastic parts gently so as not to over tighten as mentioned in previous reviews. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine MLP Pagano

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly to create a photo background for a bridal shower. It held snap-together flower panels that were kind of heavy. There was some give in the top pole but it was stable, and did not leave permanent damage. I think this is a very reliable product for normal use in holding backgrounds. It is nicely portable and lightweight enough to carry easily. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CAME BROKEN like many others said
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to get lucky and like a lot of others, mine came broken, the day before my event, so I couldn't use it. The poles are metal, but the joints are VERY CHEAP plastic. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: amazonmommy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Went ahead and set it up as best ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of one stand arrived broken. Very disappointed. Went ahead and set it up as best I could anyway. Seems sturdy otherwise and other people have had success with it, so I am considering trying my luck and reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big enough to do the job, but top bar sags
customer_reviews.text: The legs are sturdy and you can’t beat the size for coverage but I was hoping with the locking cross bar that the 10ft width would stay straight. It says a little and it could use some support right in the middle. This causing some draping of the green screen. As long as you have sufficient lighting, you should be good.
customer_reviews.author: RedPill78

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great for backdrops. Was used for a silk flower wall (7x9) at a wedding. Everyone stopped to take pictures in front of it. I don't think you can use materials too heavy because it will need more support in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: R. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Compact, good price
customer_reviews.text: Very very easy to assemble! Love the bag it came in all of that fits in 1 skinny bag. It does sag just a little in the middle the more you extend it but not super noticeable. *please be aware that any bit of wind will knock it over, purchase sandbags or use something heavy to hold it down. I had to use horses shoes as an on the spot solution.( If party is indoors I that won’t be a problem)
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Overall good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Have used once so far and it worked just as I thought it should. Didn’t see any sagging as some mentioned but I didn’t have it full size. Bag arrived damaged but I reported it and received a replacement so kudos for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: donna jensen

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy !!
customer_reviews.text: The center column does not take the weight of 8 feet paper roll, it bends... not happy, bought this item thinking this will be my primary backdrop stand but now my old stand is still my primary and this is now a backup !! totally disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Naveen

customer_reviews.title: This backdrop stand is very nice easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: This backdrop stand is very nice easy to setup. This is everything they claim it to be. I'm sure that there might be better one out there but for the price I don't feel you can beat it! I'm very happy with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: not as sturdy as i thought
customer_reviews.text: i thought that was going be alot studio than it is. don't get me wrong it does the job but it's still a plastic background stand i was excepting thicker metal parts it hold a white vinyl background from savage nicely though but bows in the middle
customer_reviews.author: chazz

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty not durable
customer_reviews.text: The lock knob broke out and cannot be placed back in. I bought two of Limostudio products and noticed the poor quality. Don’t expect better quality with heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what i need.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy set up. Takes about 5 to 10 minutes at most. The quality of the stand is solid and didn't notice any bowing fully extended (Used a muslin backdrop). The bag had a slight hole/rip in it from one of the pieces upon arrival. Other than that, it is exactly what I needed. I was worried about the other products that that mentioned the quality was not good. Only used it once so far and it met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: francesco cartiera jr

customer_reviews.title: Reliable!
customer_reviews.text: I apologize it took so long to review, but I purchased this to use for some kids to fundraiser. It worked out wonderfully, and everyone says thank you!
customer_reviews.author: M R Art

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well built. The stand is wide enough to keep my 10 wide foam backed green screen stable. the knobs are well built and I suspect will last my expected lifetime for this. The stand assembles very easily. The upper bar bends ever so slightly in the middle under the weight of the backdrop but is not of any concern. I am very happy I chose this and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy.. don't waste your money on something cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a must have... very sturdy.. don't waste your money on something cheaper... this one will satisfy your every need. Very sturdy!! I hung 3 10ft by 12ft muslin backdrops on it to unwrinkle and it held up perfectly. I would and will buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Foto friendly

customer_reviews.title: Very well built!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and the supports match my lighting stands. I put a heavy 5x7 roll of vinyl on this one and it performed tremendously. I used one extension and the other two are stored under the table. The picture of my setup, although this would not be possible without this incredible asset.
customer_reviews.author: Pure Diesel Power

customer_reviews.title: Seems of decent quality but parts were missing
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to be of decent quality but we received ours without 2 bars that should have been included. We had half of it put together before figuring this out. Very disappointed- had to put everything back in the box to return. Hopefully the next one we buy doesn't get sent to us incomplete as the one we received.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H

customer_reviews.title: Sensational !
customer_reviews.text: This is one great setup. I used it during my photo-shoots. I noticed when I used one less horizontal bar than provided, that it doesn't bend with the cloth across it. Folds up like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Rose

customer_reviews.title: Broken Piece
customer_reviews.text: There was a broken piece delivered to me. I’ve contacted the seller via email a month ago and I’ve yet to hear from anyone. I understand how things may break but please communicate with me so I’ll know.
customer_reviews.author: NaturalGoddess

customer_reviews.title: Too Good to Be True
customer_reviews.text: I used this backdrop stand system to support a very light cloth tapestry. It worked wonderful for two uses. After that, the tubes came apart at the two areas where you can adjust the height. I knew it was too good to be true. If you're going to set this backdrop up once and leave it like that for the rest of its useful life, then yes, this backdrop should do the trick. But if you're going to be setting up and taking it down, I'd invest more money into a dependable system.
customer_reviews.author: tom dolphin

customer_reviews.title: great strong stand
customer_reviews.text: Shipped very quickly, great strong stand. I use this as a backdrop at trade shows. I love the carrying case it comes in. We forgot the instructions but set it up the first time in 5 minutes. Take down and storage is flawless too. I am so happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Char Chaffee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and easy to adjust both height and width. It seems fairly sturdy and although I haven't used the final width pole yet, it holds 5 sheer curtain panels and a couple of light strings without sagging. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wittekind

customer_reviews.title: Great stand. It's heavy duty and made well
customer_reviews.text: Great stand. It's heavy duty and made well. Setup wasn't to bad I had someone help me. I used a heavy back ground fabric. Led curtain lights. And a mesh front fabric. It did somewhat sag in the middle of the stand but just slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Background bracket. Needs center stand to make it work better.
customer_reviews.text: The Pole needs a center bracket when used at full length. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Teri Patton

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great and the set up is super simple. No instructions were needed though, they were provided! I am please with the carrying bag as well. I set it up and used it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Prettyboogs

customer_reviews.title: LimoStudio Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Was going to buy the cheaper one but bought this one because it says heavy duty. This product IS deff heavy duty. Very sturdy. Very strong. Great for those heavy muslin clothes
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and company
customer_reviews.text: Awesome system, it has proved to be strong with the ability to hold different back drops of multiple types of material. Great warranty service too, I was able to replace a piece with no cost to me.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for its price.
customer_reviews.text: *5 star review as it is a decent product for its price. It’s sturdy and hefty so you know it’s not plastic and is actually metal. If you shake it, it does not make too much clinking sounds. Quality control and a decent product makes this an easy seller
customer_reviews.author: Tony Tang

customer_reviews.title: I almost went with cheap 25$ ones I am glad I spend some money
customer_reviews.text: I am actually using this for a 9 x 6 LED curtain for mobile djing. I almost went with cheap 25$ ones I am glad I spend some money. The Tripods have spring loaded bar that I could see being useful for a few reasons, and one of them being to fit in the bag. Did I mention the bag included was almost worth the price alone? Pockets inside for each stand and they are nice and padded. This whole thing will save me space and im confident it will last me for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Coulthard

customer_reviews.title: Solid build, flexible width and height and nice carry bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a backdrop for my band when we do gigs in bars and restaurants. We use a white 12x10 linen cloth with clamps. The bag was damaged when I received it. I contacted the supplier who replied immediately that they would send a new one and sure enough I have a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Louise

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble! The bag it came in is great. makes it so easy to transport. I only used three of the bars, so not sure about the dip in the middle others were talking about. There's one thing though that was a bit annoying. Being as though it goes up 10ft high, if you choose to extended it all the way up you have to make sure you get each side the exact same height or your backdrop will be on a slant and uneven. It should have little notches or marks along the pole. But other than that I like it. Its pretty sturdy and it great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the sturdiest frame that I have seen in a long time. Quick shipment, packaging and we are completely happy! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Olive Bean

customer_reviews.title: Decent but top bar sags. Fast to setup
customer_reviews.text: Overall Decent. The bar on top sags. The directions claim this is a "feature" Fast to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy and worth the money if you are not planning ...
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy and worth the money if you are not planning to put bricks on it this is all you will need as far as backdrop supports goes. The light stand is definitely heavy duty and the cross bar can support more than 10lbs of weight. Relly worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Akshar

customer_reviews.title: The stands are sturdy and well made and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: The stands are sturdy and well made and easy to set up. I am pleased with the. I don't think the provided case will hold up to years of use, but should last for a while though. I am a professional photographer, and use my equipment heavily.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Professional and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace our old set which was 10 years old, I believe these will last another 10.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to set up. Works with cloth or paper. Set it up for a wedding to take family photos, and even with drunks around it, it survived unscathed. This stand is better than the one I had purchased 10 years ago... this is the one you need...
customer_reviews.author: Thom H.

customer_reviews.title: Started falling apart after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: It worked well enough at first but then it started falling apart. I am going to buy something different.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Findlay

customer_reviews.title: Very very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product! Well built, up to 12' feet wide! Very very easy to assemble, adjust, put up, take down. Stores perfectly, labeled correctly. All around really really happy with this purchase. i don't review much, but felt this was definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Madero

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backdrop support.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backdrop stand to shoot an on location corporate portrait job. Setup was fast and easy to do by myself. The stand handled my 10X20 white vinyl backdrop without any issues. There's a slight bow in the cross bar when the backdrop is on it but that is completely normal. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: andrew black

customer_reviews.title: Good product for value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and value for the studio beginner. I purchased for headshots, and this worked perfectly. It’s a little awkward once assembled, but that is the nature of this setup. Held up well, easy to assemble, not too heavy. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Lim

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job. So far holds up well. I could see how some of the screws could strip out, but haven't had any issues. Everything seems to be working well. The stands seem to hold up well and for the limited use I will need them for, I think they will be just fine But could be made with better material. Overall the price is right for the quality and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great stand, lousy bag
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy the stand was to assemble, but the bag zipper broke the first time I used it. I wonder if I could get a replacement without sending the whole stand back?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backdrop, not so great travel bag.
customer_reviews.text: The backdrop is very sturdy and it is HUGE! Easy to setup and takedown. Only complaint was that the travel bag was somewhat shody. The handle lightly caught on my suitcase when unloading it from my car, and it made a 2" tear where the handles attach to the bag. The handle basically fell off from that point (my first trip with it). Be careful that you don't damage the travel bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Cross bar is a bit awkward to put together, ...
customer_reviews.text: Cross bar is a bit awkward to put together, but holds up well. Used it with an 8ft roll of paper without any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E Albin

product_meta.title: LimoStudio, 12 feet 5 inch (W) x 10 feet (H) Backdrop Muslin Support Structure System with 1.45 inch Thick Stable Pole, Carry Bag, AGG1782
feature_bullets: 💪Package Includes: 5 x Cross Bar / 2 x Side Stand / 1 x Carry Bag
💪Length Adjustable: Width 4.5 ft.–12 ft. / Height 4 ft.–10 ft.
💪1.45-inch Thick Strong & Durable Pole, No Wobbling
💪45-inch Unfolded Leg Diameter Secures better Stability
